Description: Main job document for warehouse operations
Guide Questions: What are your typical warehouse job types? How do you manage job workflows? What are your job approval processes? How do you track job progress?
How do you manage items within jobs? What are your item allocation requirements? How do you handle item movements?
What operations do you perform in your warehouse? How do you track operation progress? What are your operation time standards?
How do you link customer orders to warehouse jobs? What are your order fulfillment requirements? How do you manage order priorities?
How do you perform stock counts? What are your counting procedures? How do you handle count discrepancies?
How do you manage dock door assignments? What are your loading/unloading procedures? How do you schedule dock usage?
How do you charge for warehouse jobs? What are your job charge types? How do you calculate job charges?
Do you use job operation templates? How do you create job templates? What are your template requirements?
How do you manage job template items? What are your job template requirements? How do you maintain job templates?
